content.rendered:
Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone

Home

Menu
  • Overview
  • Locations
  • Advantages
  • Consultation

Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone

Prices starting fromAED 5,750

The Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone is located on Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road in Sharjah, less than ten minutes away from the Sharjah International Airport. This free zone is only 15 minutes away from the Dubai International Airport and its aim to be a place where your publishing business can thrive. We can help you with company setup in Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone.

Set up in 2017 by His Highness Sheikh Dr. Sultan bin Muhammad Al-Qasimi, the Ruler of Sharjah and a member of the Federal Supreme Council of the United Arab Emirates, the Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone is the world’s first free zone that is dedicated exclusively to the global print and publishing industry. You can write, design, print, publish and distribute from a single state-of-the-art dedicated free zone that is just 30 minutes away from Dubai’s business district.

The Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone offers co-working spaces, retail outlets, commercial offices, and storage facilities. So no matter what your needs, if you are in the publishing industry, there is a place for you – the right place to be – at the Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone.

Why choose Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone?

The Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone is operated by the Sharjah Book Authority, which also oversees the Sharjah International Book Fair, which is the largest event of its kind in the Middle East. It is one of the world’s top publishing events, drawing in more than 2.23 million visitors every year. Some 1,874 publishers from 77 nations around the world take part, putting on display some 1.6 million titles on average.

Freezone Locations

  • JAFZA
  • DMCC
  • DWTC
  • IFZA DSO
  • Sharjah Media City
  • Sharjah Publishing City
  • SAIF Zone
  • RAKEZ
  • Ajman Media City
  • Fujairah Creative City
  • JAFZA
  • DMCC
  • DWTC
  • IFZA DSO
  • Sharjah Media City
  • Sharjah Publishing City
  • SAIF Zone
  • RAKEZ
  • Ajman Media City
  • Fujairah Creative City

The annual Sharjah International Book Fair also sees around 80,000 new titles each year, and there is also a two-day Publishers Conference held on the sidelines of the Sharjah International Book Fair for the buying and selling of rights to books and publications. All these translate into opportunities for those located in the Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone.

Sharjah, the third largest emirate in the United Arab Emirates, is also home to 40% of industrial activity in the country. It is well-served by three ports – Port Khalid, Port KhorFakkan and the Hamriyah Free Zone Port – in addition to the Sharjah International Airport. These present a strategic advantage for those in the Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone.

Companies from Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Egypt, Iraq, Jordan, Syria, Lebanon, Palestine, India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Ghana, Malaysia, Turkey, The Philippines, Albania, Ireland, Sweden, New Zealand, Tanzania, Singapore and the United Kingdom all rub shoulders with each other at the Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone, lending themselves to that truly international experience.

Advantages of Sharjah Publishing City

One of the major advantages is that you can establish your publishing business in the Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone with zero startup capital.

  • 100% foreign ownership allowed
  • Zero corporate and income taxes
  • Open 24/7 to cater to the needs of the publishing industry Open 24/7 to cater to the needs of the publishing industry
  • Business License granted in ten days
  • More than 1,500 designated commercial activities allowed
  • Can have a Dual Business License (both Mainland and Free Zone)
  • Easy opening of Corporate Bank Account

Documents required for Company Setup in Sharjah Publishing City

  • Copy of passport
  • Copy of residence visa (if already in the UAE)
  • Copy of educational certificates [for Managers]
  • Two passport-sized photographs

This is applicable for all Directors, Shareholders, and Managers of the proposed company.

In case the company already exists outside the Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone, notarized and attested copies of the following are also required at the time of application.

  • Certificate of Incorporation
  • Memorandum of Association
  • Board Resolution agreeing to set up a company in the Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone
  • Incumbency Certificate / Certificate of Good Standing (if applicable)

For more details, get in touch with us.

Furnished Office

Starting at AED 1,100 per year

Business License

Starting at AED 5,750 per year

Duration of Visa

Up to 10 years
